entry.title: Wednesday night: Snow. Temperature steady near minus 10.
entry.summary: Snow ending before morning then cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind up to 15 km/h. Temperature steady near minus 10. Wind chill near minus 15. Forecast issued 6:36 PM EST Wednesday 11 January 2023
